title: Colorado Ballet Featured with on Pointe Style by ML Furs
text:
ML Furs is proud to announce the release of the Fall/Winter 2015-16 look book featuring the dancers of the Colorado Ballet. More information is available at the MLFurs.com website.
Denver, Colorado
ML Furs, a leading national furrier, is pleased to feature the classically trained dancers of the Colorado Ballet in their Fall/Winter 2015-16 season look book , entitled “Fur en Pointe—A Night at the Ballet.”
Marks-Lloyds Furs, more commonly known worldwide as ML Furs, was pleased to work with the Colorado Ballet under the creative direction of Gil Boggs in a partnership that showcased Morgan Buchanan, Kevin Hale, Tracy Jones, and Domenico Luciano. The dancer’s grace and dramatic appeal in a variety of fur coats, hats, vests, and accessories was shot on location at the Ellie Caulkins Opera House in Denver. Dance and fashion are embodied art forms that influence each other. Featuring mixtures of movement, tantalizing textures and haute hemlines, the look book showcases a variety of luxurious fur for the upcoming fall and winter season.
The pairing was a match made in heaven. “Is there anything more beautiful and dramatic than the ballet?” says Kimberly Gross, Chief Marketing Officer. “When it comes to elegance and poise, these images or rather pictures are worth a thousand words. This was an opportunity that we cultivated—not only because of the beauty of the dancers, but because we also love to support our local community and the creative arts.”
The “Fur en Pointe—A Night at the Ballet” look book features a mix of dancers and models wearing furs in a variety of colors and styles. Hairstylists and makeup artists for the shoot were Katelyn Simkins and Jillian Berres. Photography services were provided by Zorn Photography. Fur styling was designed by ML Furs and Dahlia Weinstein, Models used were Alexis Broker and Tom Firth.
ML Furs offers a wide variety of garments, such as jackets, capes, stoles, throws, vests, hats, scarves, handbags, and more. Clothing designers include Michael Kors, Adrienne Landau, Zandra Rhodes, Zuki, Guy LaRoche, EM-EL and more.
Consumers interested in any of the fall and winter fur lines can visit the ML Furs website for more information, or call 877-MLF-FURS for assistance.
About the Company
ML Furs, or Marks-Lloyds Furs, was established in 1951. Originally named Lloyd’s Furs after the company’s original owner, Bill Lloyd, Richard and Kimberly Gross (Marks Furs) purchased Lloyd's Furs in 1993, and merged the two companies together. The company is located in Denver, Colorado. With over 68 years of combined experience in the fur and fashion industry, the company strives to offer quality fur with modern styling and accessories. For assistance, consumers can visit their website at MLFurs.com.
